snippet: Those convinced that North Korean soldiers are digging “invasion tunnels” in preparation for war continue to hunt fruitlessly for evidence of such.
abstract: Hwaseong Journal; small but dedicated band of South Koreans have been hunting for North Korean 'invasion tunnels' for years, convinced that their provocative neighbor has constructed a number of them in preparation for war; only four tunnels have been detected so far, and all of them are near the border.
lead_paragraph: Those convinced that North Korean soldiers are digging “invasion tunnels” in preparation for war continue to hunt fruitlessly for evidence of such.

headline.seo: South Korean Tunnel Hunters Search to Prove Threat
headline.main: Hunting for Tunnels to Prove a Threat
headline.print_headline: Hunting For Tunnels To Prove A Threat
